root.name: Legends of Norrath
root.description: Although Legends of Norrath is a separate game from EverQuest and EverQuest II, it is tied in with both titles.Â In either game, you may challenge a fellow player to a game of Legends of Norrath; and LoN game cards can confer items or other bonuses on characters in EQ and EQ2.
